name: Check Switch
description: A switch that checks multiple local variables and can set random variables under certain conditions.

fields.name: Trigger Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates this actor. (0 = always active)

fields.name: Checked Variable 1
fields.description: A local variable number that is checked by this actor.

fields.name: Checked Variable 2
fields.description: A local variable number that is checked by this actor.

fields.name: Checked Variable 3
fields.description: A local variable number that is checked by this actor.

fields.name: Checked Variable 4
fields.description: A local variable number that is checked by this actor.

1.name: Sets a random variable, can be triggered multiple times
